about_the_game:
A Horror game that takes place in the early 80's. you must survive "HIM" as the past residents called it. you (the player) gets in a accident due to drinking and driving, you wake up in a forest near Denton, Texas. The walk to civilization is too far to walk, you must find a way out of the forest and survive. Something lurking wants to stop you, from doing so.

In this game, the player searches a forest for clues to the next goal. But as you do so, the player must try not to get caught by the creature lurking. there are many problems ahead, the next more difficult than the last.
detailed_description:
A Horror game that takes place in the early 80's. you must survive "HIM" as the past residents called it. you (the player) gets in a accident due to drinking and driving, you wake up in a forest near Denton, Texas. The walk to civilization is too far to walk, you must find a way out of the forest and survive. Something lurking wants to stop you, from doing so.

In this game, the player searches a forest for clues to the next goal. But as you do so, the player must try not to get caught by the creature lurking. there are many problems ahead, the next more difficult than the last.
name: Don't Look at Him

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 4300U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega 5
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570 Or Better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: a horror game that takes place in a forest. complete tasks, and don't get caught.
